abstract: Facebook activated its Safety Check tool while Twitter put its new Moments tool to use, highlighting top news tweets about the attacks.
snippet: Facebook activated its Safety Check tool while Twitter put its new Moments tool to use, highlighting top news tweets about the attacks.
lead_paragraph: As the attacks in Paris were still unfolding on Friday night, social media sites lit up as sources for information that went beyond the news.

headline.main: As Paris Terror Attacks Unfolded, Social Media Tools Offered Help in Crisis
headline.print_headline: Social Media Pipelines Filled Up in Paris Crisis

byline.original: By Vindu Goel and Sydney Ember
